content: अव्याकृत {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Not developed, not manifest; तद्धेदं तर्ह्यव्याकृतमासीत्, इदं नामरूपाभ्यामव्याकृतं. <ls>Ś. B.</ls> {@--2@} Not decomposed, elementary. --तं (In Vedānta <ab>phil.</ab>) {@--1@} An elementary substance from which all things were created (considered identical with Brahma.) {@--2@} (In Sān. <ab>phil.</ab>) The prime germ of nature (प्रधान).
